verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon נְגִינַ֬ת <WH5058> upon Neginah לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David שִׁמְעָ֣ה <WH8085> Hear אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God רִנָּתִ֑י <WH7440> my cry הַ֝קְשִׁ֗יבָה <WH7181> attend תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> unto my prayer

מִקְצֵ֤ה <WH7097> From the end הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <WH776> of the earth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about אֶ֭קְרָא <WH7121> will I cry בַּעֲטֹ֣ף <WH5848> is overwhelmed לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> unto thee when my heart בְּצוּר־ <WH6697> me to the rock יָר֖וּם <WH7311> [that] is higher מִמֶּ֣נִּי <WH4480> than תַנְחֵֽנִי׃ <WH5148> lead

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> have been מַחְסֶ֣ה <WH4268> For thou hast been a shelter לִ֑י מִגְדַּל־ <WH4026> tower עֹ֝֗ז <WH5797> for me [and] a strong מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> the enemy

אָג֣וּרָה <WH1481> I will abide בְ֭אָהָלְךָ <WH168> in thy tabernacle עוֹלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> for ever אֶֽחֱסֶ֨ה <WH2620> I will trust בְסֵ֖תֶר <WH5643> in the covert כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ <WH3671> of thy wings סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> For thou O God שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ <WH8085> hast heard לִנְדָרָ֑י <WH5088> my vows נָתַ֥תָּ <WH5414> thou hast given יְ֝רֻשַּׁ֗ת <WH3425> [me] the heritage יִרְאֵ֥י <WH3373> of those that fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> life עַל־ <WH5921> and יְמֵי־ <WH3117> life מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's תּוֹסִ֑יף <WH3254> Thou wilt prolong שְׁ֝נוֹתָ֗יו <WH8141> [and] his years כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> will be as דֹ֥ר <WH1755> as many וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> generations

יֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> He shall abide ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> for ever לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> and truth מַ֣ן <WH4487> O prepare יִנְצְרֻֽהוּ׃ <WH5341> [which] may preserve

כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> So אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה <WH2167> So will I sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> praise unto thy name לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> for ever לְֽשַׁלְּמִ֥י <WH7999> perform נְדָרַ֗י <WH5088> my vows י֣וֹם ׀ <WH3117> day יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> day
